org.fluentjava.reflection
Class ReflectiveInvoker

java.lang.Object
  org.fluentjava.reflection.ReflectiveInvoker

public class ReflectiveInvoker
extends java.lang.Object

Invokes a method based only the name of the method and the class of the object whose method is being invoked. Finds the best fit method if overloaded methods are found. This class is not thread safe.

Method Summary
 java.lang.Object invoke()
          Actually do all the method lookup and invocation.
 java.lang.Object priviligedInvoke()
